songs.title: Afterlife
songs.lyrics:
[Chorus]
I think about you all the time
But don't you hear it just ain't right
For you I'd give it all up twice
Ohhhhh, ohhhhhh
Without you it just ain't right
For you I'd give it all up twice
Think about you all the time
I see you in the afterlife

[Verse 1: Kodak Black]
Got me on my knees, on my Jesus Christ
Got me on my knees, I'm like Jesus, why?
I see you in my dreams , you make me waa-ait
Say you looking down on me, why didn't you sta-ay
If the good die young, and the bad live forever
I wanna live forever
We can make it better
We can make it do, what it do
I'm talking to my goons, and my boo
I lost you all and I didn't have a damn clue
What you meant to me
That's how I went  [?] that I am to you
I can say lie-ies tryna change my eyes
Tryna change my life

[Chorus]
I think about you all the time
But don't you hear it just ain't right
For you I'd give it all up twice
Ohhhhh, ohhhhhh
Without you it just ain't right
For you I'd give it all up twice
Think about you all the time
I see you in the afterlife
